# bankr

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of bankr is to easily read personal financial data from various sources. 

Usable:  
- Wells Fargo  
  - Account Statement - Checking  
   
Work in Progress:  
- Wells Fargo  
  - Account Statement - Credit  
  - Account Statement - Savings  
- Venmo  
- Splitwise  
 
## Installation

You can install bankr from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("esurjaat/bankr")
```
